Getting to Beach Haven is a simple process. Coming from Rt 72, cross over the causeway and once on the island, make a right (South) on Long Beach Blvd. Beach Haven is 3â€“5 miles down the road.

You can get to Rt 72 either by the Garden State Parkway or by Route 9. You can also follow it in from a circle in Pemberton.
Public transportation isn't widely used here. Most people get around by car, bike or walking. There is a new
service that runs the length of the island. They also call it "LBI Dial a Ride".

value: name=Museum of New Jersey Maritime History
address=Dock Road and West Avenue Beach Haven, NJ
address=Engleside and Bay Avenue Beach Haven, NJ
content=Mr. Tee's is a classic arcade located in Beach Haven and is lots of fun for the family.
address=320 Seventh Street Beach Haven, NJ

content=Fantasy Island is a Victorian designed amusement park that is great for families.  They have an arcade, games, and rides.  They also offer a food court with classic choices and an ice cream stand.
address=Bay Village 9th and Bay Ave. Beach Haven
address=9th and Bay Ave. Beach Haven, NJ
address=Schooner's Wharf - 325 9th Street Beach Haven, NJ
address=Schooners Wharf - 325 9th Street Beach Haven, NJ
address=Silver Sun Mall - Third and North Bay Ave.
address=229 Pearl Street Beach Haven, NJ
address=101 N. Bay Ave. Beach Haven, NJ

content=Claimed "A Jersey Shore Legend", folks have been eating at Buckalew's for over a century. There is a fairly priced menu, great service, and multiple dining areas.  They also offer live music and entertainment.  Buckalew's has a great family atmosphere, but once it hits night time the bar is a lot of fun.
address=30 Engleside Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Leeward Room is only one of the three restaurants the Engleside Inn offers.  If you are looking for a more formal dining experience then the Leeward Room is the right choice.  They offer a regular dining menu, a children's menu, a wine list, and a martini list.  Prices are a little high.
name=Engleside Inn - Sushi Bar and Lounge
address=30 Engleside Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Sushi Bar and Lounge at Engleside Inn offers an extensive sushi menu, whether you are new to sushi or a sushi connoisseur they will have something for you.  At night time the bar comes alive and they offer musical entertainment.
address=30 Engleside Ave. Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Sand Bar is the more relaxing and casual dining option.  On sunny days, The Sand Bar is a great place to go with friends and enjoy a nice drink in the sunshine.  It is fairly priced and a very friendly atmosphere.
address=212 Centre Street Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Gables is a refurbished antique home that has been turned into a fantastic upscale restaurant. They offer two menus: dinner and brunch.  Reservations for this fabulous dining experience should be made far in advance.
address=1106 North Bay Ave. Beach Haven, NJ

content=Panzone's Pizza and Pasta is your classic Italian restaurant located right in Beach Haven, NJ.  Their menu offers everything Italian from pizza and calamari to pasta and classic chicken dishes.  Prices are moderate and it is a nice, casual eating experience. They were named "Best Pizza on LBI" from Inside Jersey/NJ.com in June 2010.
name=Sea Shell Resort and Beach Club - Breakfast on the Beach
address=10 South Atlantic Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Sea Shell Resort and Beach Club offers a one of a kind Breakfast on the Beach Restaurant. As you can see from its name, you can enjoy a freshly made breakfast while sitting sea side.  For the early risers of the Jersey Shore they open at 7:30AM, and they serve until 11:30AM for those who enjoy sleeping in.
name=Sea Shell Resort and Beach Club - The Palm Tree Restaurant
address=10 South Atlantic Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Palm Tree Restaurant offers more of an upscale dining experience at the Sea Shell Club.  They have fresh fish dishes along with a myriad of other selections.  Prices are a little expensive but definitely worth it.  They also offer a wine list.
name=Sea Shell Resort and Beach Club - The Palm Grill
address=10 South Atlantic Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Palm Grill at the Sea Shell Club is a relaxed pool side restaurant.  They have wraps, sandwiches, fish sandwiches, and a lot of little snacks to eat while lounging pool side at the Sea Shell Club.
name=The Shell Beach Club and Tiki
address=10 South Atlantic Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Shell Beach Club and Tiki is located in the Shell Beach Club and is located right on the water. It is a relaxed atmosphere and some of the biggest bands in Ocean County play there.  The Tiki Bar is a mini escape to the tropical islands.  This is a great place to go with friends.
address=10 South Atlantic Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

content=The Shell Nightclub is located in the Sea Shell Beach Club and is consistently awarded the best night club in Ocean County.  They have five bars and an extended dance floor.  It is considered the place to be in LBI to mingle and meet new people.
address=21 Coral Street Beach Haven, NJ
address=212 Centre Street Beach Haven, NJ

address=200 South Atlantic Avenue Beach Haven, NJ

address=215 Centre Street Beach Haven, NJ
